A confident woman beside a sleek sports car as traffic passes and people move in the background. She dances smoothly while facing the camera, her movements controlled and rhythmic, keeping her body centered in frame. She raps clearly in English, her mouth visibly synced to the vocals, over a hip-hop beat, saying: “Neon on the pavement, city dripping light, engine humming low while I’m owning the night, eyes on the camera, feel the bass when I move, slow orbit round me, yeah I’m locked in the groove.”
